message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/Carlos%27_Tasks/queries 

bio2rdf queries

Query 1
SPARQLquery =
        	"PREFIX gene: <http://bio2rdf.org/ns/bio2rdf#> " +
        	"SELECT ?dbpediaResource.taxon ?RDFResource.gene ?resourceB.x ?resourceC.genBank " +
        	" FROM RDFResource: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> " +
        	" FROM dbpediaResource: <http://geneid.bio2rdf.org/sparql> " +
        	" FROM resourceB: <http://geneid.bio2rdf.org/sparql> " +
        	" FROM resourceC: <http://geneid.bio2rdf.org/sparql> " +
        	" WHERE" +
        	" {" +
        	" 	<http://bio2rdf.org/iproclass:Q8KKD2> <http://bio2rdf.org/ns/iproclass#xGeneid> ?RDFResource.gene ." +
        	"	?dbpediaResource.gene  <http://bio2rdf.org/ns/bio2rdf#xTaxon> ?dbpediaResource.taxon . " +
        	"	?resourceB.taxon <http://bio2rdf.org/ontology/bio2rdf:xGI> ?resourceB.x . " +
        	" 	?resourceC.x  <http://bio2rdf.org/ontology/ncbi:featureID> ?resourceC.genBank . " +
        	"}";
This query involves the SPARQL end points
Uniprot
,
GenBank
,
Iproclass
and
Taxon
. The OGSA-DAI configuration files can be found
here
This query asks for the gene id related to the protein
http://bio2rdf.org/iproclass:Q8KKD2
and its name in the taxonomy used by the bio2rdf project.
SPARQLquery =
        	"SELECT ?geneid.gene ?iproclass.gene ?taxon.x ?genbank.genBank " +
        	" FROM iproclass: <http://iproclass.bio2rdf.org/sparql> " +
			" FROM geneid: <http://geneid.bio2rdf.org/sparql> " +
        	" FROM taxon: <http://localhost:2020/sparql-taxon> " +
        	" FROM genbank: <http://castor.dia.fi.upm.es:2020/sparql-genebank> " +
        	" WHERE" +
        	" {" +
        	" 	<http://bio2rdf.org/iproclass:Q8KKD2> <http://bio2rdf.org/ns/iproclass#xGeneid> ?iproclass.gene ." +
			"	?geneid.gene  <http://bio2rdf.org/ns/bio2rdf#xTaxon> ?geneid.taxon . " +
        	"}";
This query asks for the gene id related to the protein
http://bio2rdf.org/iproclass:Q8KKD2
and its name in the taxonomy used by the bio2rdf project. It also queries for the gene that it codifies this taxonomy,
SPARQLquery =
        	"SELECT ?geneid.gene ?iproclass.gene ?taxon.x ?genbank.genBank " +
        	" FROM iproclass: <http://iproclass.bio2rdf.org/sparql> " +
			" FROM geneid: <http://geneid.bio2rdf.org/sparql> " +
        	" FROM taxon: <http://localhost:2020/sparql-taxon> " +
        	" FROM genbank: <http://castor.dia.fi.upm.es:2020/sparql-genebank> " +
        	" WHERE" +
        	" {" +
        	" 	<http://bio2rdf.org/iproclass:Q8KKD2> <http://bio2rdf.org/ns/iproclass#xGeneid> ?iproclass.gene ." +
			"	?geneid.gene  <http://bio2rdf.org/ns/bio2rdf#xTaxon> ?geneid.taxon . " +
			"	?taxon.taxon <http://bio2rdf.org/ontology/bio2rdf:xGI> ?taxon.x . " +
        	"}";
Finally this query connects to the gene bank SPARQL endpoint and asks for the gen related to the taxonomy
SPARQLquery =
        	"SELECT ?geneid.gene ?iproclass.gene ?taxon.x ?genbank.genBank " +
        	" FROM iproclass: <http://iproclass.bio2rdf.org/sparql> " +
		" FROM geneid: <http://geneid.bio2rdf.org/sparql> " +
        	" FROM taxon: <http://localhost:2020/sparql-taxon> " +
        	" FROM genbank: <http://castor.dia.fi.upm.es:2020/sparql-genebank> " +
        	" WHERE" +
        	" {" +
        	" 	<http://bio2rdf.org/iproclass:Q8KKD2> <http://bio2rdf.org/ns/iproclass#xGeneid> ?iproclass.gene ." +
		"	?geneid.gene  <http://bio2rdf.org/ns/bio2rdf#xTaxon> ?geneid.taxon . " +
		"	?taxon.taxon <http://bio2rdf.org/ontology/bio2rdf:xGI> ?taxon.x . " +
        	" 	?genbank.x  <http://bio2rdf.org/ontology/ncbi:featureID> ?genbank.genBank . " +
        	"}";
speaker: SYSTEM
